topics.body:
Arrh! Feast your eyes. Look into the mirror, it never lies!
You're a pirate!
Can't you see that this is no disguise?
You live to loot and pillage, maim and terrorize!
Your reflection tells the story of a pirate's life of glory,
Trust your eyes! Arrh!
The mirror never lies! Arrh!

How can this be?
I faintly recall swinging tree to tree!
Now I see a pirate that's in front of me!
With slimy skin and beady eyes, what a surprise!
My reflection tells the story of a pirate's life of glory, trust my eyes!
The mirror never lies.

The reflection tells the story of a pirate's life of glory, trust your eyes!
Arrh! The mirror never lies!
The mirror never lies...
